member.name: NMHDFILTERBTNCLICK
member.summary: Specifies or receives the attributes of a filter button click.

member.name: NMHDFILTERBTNCLICK.hdr
member.summary: A handle of an structure that contains additional information.

member.name: NMHDFILTERBTNCLICK.iItem
member.summary: The zero-based index of the control to which this structure refers.

member.name: NMHDFILTERBTNCLICK.rc
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that contains the client rectangle for the filter button.
